root.name: The Residents: Bad Day on the Midway
root.description: Soundtrack In 1996 The Residents released a companion soundtrack to Bad Day on the Midway titled "Have A Bad Day." Track listing: Bad Day on the MidwayDagmar, the Dog WomanI Ain't Seen No RatsTears of the TaxmanGod's TeardropsThe Seven TattoosThe Marvels of MayhemLottie the Human LogUgly LiberationDaddy's PoemsThe Red Head of DeathTimmy
